thread.title: Pradeep kumar N S
thread.title_full: Lenskart reviewed by Pradeep kumar N S

author: Pradeep kumar N S
title: Pradeep kumar N S
text: I went to several eye clinic and was confused about why my headache, and no one gave me a clear understanding about headache. Lens kart executive spend an hour and educated me on each and everything I should be knowing. Best part is the specs, cost effective and great collections.
